creditline: The Sharon and Bill Richardson Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: young woman wearing a turquoise tank top, turquoise and black skirt, white shoes and white beaded headdress, seated bareback on a white speckled horse, standing in front of a backdrop painted with blue sky and white clouds
marks: Signature, Title and Edition on back, in pencil: [X. Tavera II  Domadora de Cab
text: Born in Mexico City, Xavier Tavera is now based in Minneapolis and well known for his portraits. His "El Circo" series composes hand-crafted backgrounds of his own design, enhancing the figures he poses in front of them. Tiara-clad head held high, this woman on a white horse evokes a princess caught in a fairytale gone awry. What details capture your attention and how do they define the character type'
title: Domadora de Caballos (Woman on White Horse)
